quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quote: He who fights with monsters should be careful lest he thereby become a monster.
author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.
author: William Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit; Genius hits a target no one else can see.

quote: Compassion is the basis of morality.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Plato

quote: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.
author: Plato

quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
author: Plato

quote: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injustice.

quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.

quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.

quote: All truth is simple... is that not doubly a lie?

quote: Every man takes the limits of his own field of vision for the limits of the world.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Change is the only constant.
author: Heraclitus

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.

quote: He who angers you conquers you.

quote: If you want to be happy, be.

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

author: Lao Tzu

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.

quote: The only thing I know is that I know nothing.

quote: The life of man, solitary, poor, nasty, brutish, and short.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Liberty consists in doing what one desires.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: Man is condemned to be free.
